properties.description: Wednesday in term time. Youth drop in TNT 3.10-5pm. 2025 dates TBC "Pizza and Games nights" 5.30-7.30pm. Pizzas, games, crafts, etc with a short gathering time. Wednesday 18 December Wednesday 15th January 2025 Thursday 6th February Thursday 6th March "Come to coffee" 10.30 - 12 noon, with a short reflection around 11.30am Church building on the level with accessible toilet. properties.address: Samudra Buddhist Centre, Buxton, Derbyshire SK17 6HB
properties.description: Everybody's welcome at Samudra Buddhist Centre ðŸ˜€ We are open as a Warm and Welcoming Space each week day morning from 10am to 12.30. You will receive a warm welcome from our volunteers to an inclusive, non-judgmental space where everyone is treated equally, with dignity and respect. We will provide a hot drink and biscuits with comfortable chairs in a warm, peaceful and safe environment. There will also be the opportunity to attend free meditation classes if you wish. These Calm Your Mind free meditation classes will be given on Friday 12.30 til 1pm and Sunday 6.30 til 7.30 pm. We hope that everyone will take the opportunity in these meditation sessions to learn how simple breathing meditation can bring real calm and peace to our troubled minds. Drop-in when you like and walk away feeling refreshed. No need to book
properties.title: Samudra Buddhist Centre

properties.description: Welcome to the grade II listed Pump Room in the heart of Buxton. Open 10.00 - 16.00 daily, you can receive free hot drinks, charge your devices and enjoy the historic space. We also have fruit and biscuits and access to Buxton mineral water flowing straight from the spring at 27.5c On Fridays we have Crafternoons 1-3pm where you can come, make and take home your creations with expert tuition. The final Friday morning of each month is Pitter Patter for the under-fives and their adults from 9.20am. Come for a social event with dressing up, books, toys and lots of fun within the Crescent building. For complimentary hot drinks, simply come in, take a seat at one of our cafÃ© tables and a member of staff will be over to offer you a beverage. Crafternoons and Pitter Patter are bookable on our website, use the discount code WARMSPACE to reduce the ticket price to free.
properties.title: The Pump Room
